s0520: Entering the duke's gate, bowing like;
s0522: Lord summoned to act as host, color stern like.
s0523: Lord commanded summon, did not wait for harness departed.
s0524: Fish spoiled, meat rotten, cut not proper, not eat.
s0526: Eating at the side of mourners, never full.
s0527: That day cried, then not sing.
s0528: Seeing mourning garments, blind people, though children must change.
s0530: 'Virtue not cultivated, learning not lectured, hearing righteousness cannot move, not good cannot change, this is my worry.'
s0531: Made people sing, good, then made repeat, then harmonized with it.
s0532: Did not speak of: strange, force, disorder, spirits.
s0533: Zi Gong said: 'The Master's culture can be heard.
s0534: The Master speaking of heavenly way and human nature, cannot be heard.'
s0535: Yan Yuan sighed deeply: 'Gaze up increasingly high, drill increasingly firm.
s0537: The Master step by step skillfully guides people, broadens me with culture, restrains me with ritual, wish to stop cannot.
s0538: Having exhausted my talent, as if standing, outstanding.
s0539: Though wish to follow, no way.'
s0540: Da Xiang village child said: 'Great indeed Confucius, broadly learned yet has no accomplished name.'
s0541: Heard it, said: 'What do I hold?
s0545: Lao said: 'Master said "not tested, thus arts".'
s0547: Lu Ai Gong fourteenth year spring, hunted Great Wilds.
s0548: Shusun family charioteer Zi Chu Shang captured beast, considered inauspicious.
s0549: Zhong Ni viewed it, said: 'A qilin.'
s0551: Said: 'River does not produce diagram, Luo does not produce book, I am finished!'
s0552: Yan Yuan died, Confucius said: 'Heaven destroys me!'
s0553: When western hunt saw qilin, said: 'My Way is exhausted!'
s0555: Zi Gong said: 'Why none know master?'
s0556: Said: 'Not resent heaven, not blame people, study below reach above, those who know me, heaven!'
s0558: 'Not lower their will, not disgrace their person, Bo Yi, Shu Qi!'
s0559: Said 'Liu Xia Hui, Shao Lian lowered will disgraced person.'
s0560: Said 'Yu Zhong, Yi Yi hidden dwelling loose words, conduct midst pure, abandoned midst balance'.
s0561: 'I then different from this, no can no cannot.'
s0563: Said: 'Alas alas, gentleman grieves dying in age and name not fitting.
s0564: My Way not practiced, how can I appear to later generations?'
s0565: Thus based on historical records composed Spring and Autumn, above to Yin Gong, below ends Ai Gong fourteenth year, twelve dukes.
s0566: Based on Lu, close to Zhou, thus Yin, moved through three dynasties.
s0568: Therefore Wu Chu lords self-called kings, but Spring and Autumn demoted them as 'zi';
s0569: Jian Tu meeting actually summoned Zhou Son of Heaven, but Spring and Autumn euphemized as 'Heavenly King hunted at He Yang': push this category to bind the present age.
s0570: Demote damage meanings, later kings will raise and expand them.
s0571: Spring and Autumn meanings practiced, then All Under Heaven's rebellious ministers and villainous sons fear.
s0572: Confucius in position heard lawsuits, literary phrases had what could be shared with others, not possessed alone.
